00039 WLibrary::~WLibrary()

00042   delete p_;

00053 bool WLibrary::load(const char *fileName)
00054 {
00055   if (p_->lib_ != 0)
00056     unload();
00057 
00058   if (p_->lib_ == 0)
00059   {
00060     p_->lib_ = LoadLibrary(fileName);
00061     
00062     if (p_->lib_ != 0)
00063       p_->path_ = fileName;
00064   }
00065 
00066   return p_->lib_ != 0;
00067 }
00068 
00073 void WLibrary::unload()
00074 {
00075   if (FreeLibrary(p_->lib_) == TRUE)
00076   {
00077     p_->lib_ = 0;
00078     p_->path_.clear();
00079   }
00080 }
00081 
00085 bool WLibrary::isLoaded() const
00086 {
00087   return p_->lib_ != 0;
00088 }
00089 
00099 int WLibrary::path(char *buffer, int size) const
00100 {
00101   if (buffer != 0)
00102     buffer[p_->path_.copy(buffer, size)] = 0;
00103   return p_->path_.length();
00104 }
00105 
00117 void *WLibrary::import(const char *functionName)
00118 {
00119   return GetProcAddress(p_->lib_, functionName);
00120 }
